New Records: Australia set the highest-ever T20 international first powerplay score of 113/1 for the opening six overs
Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh smashed 30 off one over from Jack Jarvis
Both Head and Marsh fell to Mark Watt in the seventh over
Josh Inglis's quick-fire unbeaten 27 helped earn Australia a seven-wicket victory with 62 balls to spare
Miscellaneous Highlights: George Munsey top scored for Scotland with 28
Sean Abbott was the pick of the Australia bowlers with three for 39
